snippet.title: Coffin Rot Brewing Co. Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Leap into the bootstraps of a grog-slinging bartender dishing out drinks and lead to the living undead!

As a cursed bartender that is doomed to serve for the rest of your miserable existence, it is up to you to defend the tavern's gold and glory. Ghostly patrons haunt your patchwork seats as they are served grog from their incorporeal barkeep. Necromantic hordes of skellies mindlessly wander towards your gold, practically begging for a hot serving of gunpowder. 

As you rack up combos and kills, your score will climb. Compete against your fellow freebooters to earn the title of the highest-ranking bartender!

Available Winter of 2019 through Steam VR!

Official website: https://www.coffinrotvr.com
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1112690/Coffin_Rot_Brewing_Co/
Devlog: https://www.twitter.com/CoffinRotVR

Coffin Rot Brewing Co. wouldn't exist without these wonderful people:
Austin Mullen - Sound Design, Dialogue Writer
https://www.austinmullensound.com
Simeon Seamus Davis - Voice Actor
https://simhook.wixsite.com/simeonseamus
Zach Mull - Voice Actor
Brent Mullen - Dialogue Writer
